text:
The video opens with a dedication to "William and Sadie," JT's grandparents. The two were reportedly married for 63 years, up until William's death last year. Conveniently, the music video appears to tell the story of an old widow.

After the dedication, we watch the relationship blossom between two young retro lovers, who apparently meet for the first time around a pool table. They're happy at first, but the video also cuts to an image of the woman with a tear-streaked face beside her sleeping husband. It flashes forward to the future, with the couple old, gray, and copying each other's ever...
title: What is the meaning of the video of Justin Timberlake's Mirror?
